ai-thig6.4:1.1_0: I was adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
ai-thig6.4:1.2_0: with garlands, and sandalwood makeup piled on,
ai-thig6.4:2.2_0: staples and dainties in no small amount,
ai-thig6.4:2.4_0: and betook myself to the park.
ai-thig6.4:3.1_0: I enjoyed myself there and played about,
ai-thig6.4:3.2_0: and then, returning to my own house,
ai-thig6.4:3.4_0: and so I entered the Añjana grove at Sāketa.
ai-thig6.4:4.1_0: Seeing the light of the world,
ai-thig6.4:4.2_0: I paid homage and sat down.
ai-thig6.4:4.4_0: the seer taught me the Dhamma.
ai-thig6.4:5.1_0: When I heard the great hermit,
ai-thig6.4:5.3_0: Right there I encountered the Dhamma,
ai-thig6.4:6.4_0: wasn’t in vain of the Buddha’s instructions.”
